content: {"version":2,"machineId":"16ca8f1d-a8fe-4d99-88ee-e6a55b8107c6","content":"{\"linux\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaultsauto[]\\n[\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+alt+up\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"block-travel.jumpUp\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"alt+up\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-block-travel.jumpUp\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+alt+down\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"block-travel.jumpDown\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"alt+down\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-block-travel.jumpDown\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+alt+r\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.reloadWindow\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"isDevelopment\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+r\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.reloadWindow\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"isDevelopment\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+r\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.openRecent\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+r ctrl+c\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.removeAllComments\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+r ctrl+e\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"remove-empty-lines.inDocument\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k ctrl+/\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-editor.foldAllBlockComments\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && foldingEnabled\\\"\\n    }\\n]\"}"}
